thread.title: Transformers: The Last Knight Toys Revealed At Toy Fair
thread.title_full: Transformers: The Last Knight Toys Revealed At Toy Fair

author: Jamie Lovett
title: Transformers: The Last Knight Toys Revealed At Toy Fair
text:
Transformers: The Last Knight Toys Revealed At Toy Fair Jamie Lovett Back to Article Image of 
At Toy Fair 2017, Hasbro unveiled a new line of toys based on the character from Transformers: The Last Knight , the upcoming fifth film in the Transformers live-action movie franchise. 
The new toys give fans their best look yet at Megatron, Bumblebee, and Dinobot king Grimlock as they appear in Transformers: The Last Knight . 
Tale a look at all of the new Transformers: The Last Knight toys below. 
More Transformers: The Last Knight: Trailer / Did We See Unicron ? / Will We See Primus ? 
Transformers: The Last Knight shatters the core myths of the Transformers franchise, and redefines what it means to be a hero. Humans and Transformers are at war, Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Saving our world falls upon the shoulders of an unlikely alliance: Cade Yeager (Mark Wahlberg); Bumblebee; an English Lord (Sir Anthony Hopkins); and an Oxford Professor (Laura Haddock). 
There comes a moment in everyoneâ€™s life when we are called upon to make a difference. In Transformers: The Last Knight , the hunted will become heroes. Heroes will become villains. Only one world will survive: theirs, or ours. 
Michael Bay will return to direct. Transformers: The Last Knight opens in theaters on June 23, 2017. Transformers: The Last Knight 2017 ComicBook Anticipated #59 Best-Rated Before Release Anticipated Rating
